Topic.Title: Option to hide items in Inventory

Posts.EditableText:
There is an option to "Not show in room description".  There should be an option to "Not show in inventory".

That way we can customize something like "examine my hands" or any other part.

But what I was trying to do is costumize "examine floor" by putting an object "floor" in the inventory and hide it but it didn't work.  I also tried to clone "the floor" but I failed once again.

What do you think? Any work around to achieve this?
